akn:section.akn:heading: Other claims against dissolved limited liability partnership.

akn:content.akn:p: A dissolved limited liability partnership may publish notice of its dissolution and request persons having claims against the partnership to present them in accordance with the notice.
A notice under subsection (a) of this section must:

If a dissolved limited liability partnership publishes a notice in accordance with subsection (b) of this section, the claim of each of the following claimants is barred unless the claimant commences an action to enforce the claim against the partnership not later than 3 years after the publication date of the notice:
A claim not barred under this section or ยง 29-608.08(c) may be enforced as follows:
